name: The Book of Abyss
author: WAGA COMIC
content: One day, after finishing a novel with an apocalyptic theme, Chang Ting found that the world was quietly transforming, as if the events from the novel were unfolding in reality. From the mysterious disappearance of skyscrapers to the appearance of monsters at fixed times and locations, everything was developing according to the script of the novel.
